OutboundConfig.InstallTriggerScript:
-- =============================================
-- Author: HYS -- Create date: 2007-04-11 03:33:57 -- Description: Script used to create outbound database objects, include -- View,procedure, trigger
-- ============================================= USE GWDataDB GO
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[v_SQL_OUT]')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_SQL_OUT] GO
Create View [dbo].[v_SQL_OUT] AS Select dbo.SQL_OUT_DATAINDEX.DATA_DT as DATAINDEX_DATA_DT, dbo.SQL_OUT_DATAINDEX.DATA_ID as DATAINDEX_DATA_ID, dbo.SQL_OUT_DATAINDEX.DATA_SOURCE as DATAINDEX_DATA_SOURCE, dbo.SQL_OUT_DATAINDEX.EVENT_TYPE as DATAINDEX_EVENT_TYPE, dbo.SQL_OUT_DATAINDEX.PROCESS_FLAG as DATAINDEX_PROCESS_FLAG, dbo.SQL_OUT_DATAINDEX.RECORD_INDEX_1 as DATAINDEX_RECORD_INDEX_1, dbo.SQL_OUT_DATAINDEX.RECORD_INDEX_2 as DATAINDEX_RECORD_INDEX_2, dbo.SQL_OUT_DATAINDEX.RECORD_INDEX_3 as DATAINDEX_RECORD_INDEX_3, dbo.SQL_OUT_DATAINDEX.RECORD_INDEX_4 as DATAINDEX_RECORD_INDEX_4,
dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.ACCOUNT_NUMBER as PATIENT_ACCOUNT_NUMBER, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.ADDRESS as PATIENT_ADDRESS, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.BED_NUMBER as PATIENT_BED_NUMBER, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.BIRTH_PLACE as PATIENT_BIRTH_PLACE, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.BIRTHDATE as PATIENT_BIRTHDATE, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.CITIZENSHIP as PATIENT_CITIZENSHIP, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.COUNTRY_CODE as PATIENT_COUNTRY_CODE, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.CUSTOMER_1 as PATIENT_CUSTOMER_1, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.CUSTOMER_2 as PATIENT_CUSTOMER_2, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.CUSTOMER_3 as PATIENT_CUSTOMER_3, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.CUSTOMER_4 as PATIENT_CUSTOMER_4, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.DATA_DT as PATIENT_DATA_DT, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.DATA_ID as PATIENT_DATA_ID, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.DRIVERLIC_NUMBER as PATIENT_DRIVERLIC_NUMBER, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.ETHNIC_GROUP as PATIENT_ETHNIC_GROUP, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.MARITAL_STATUS as PATIENT_MARITAL_STATUS, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.MOTHER_MAIDEN_NAME as PATIENT_MOTHER_MAIDEN_NAME, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.NATIONALITY as PATIENT_NATIONALITY, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.OTHER_PID as PATIENT_OTHER_PID, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.PATIENT_ALIAS as PATIENT_PATIENT_ALIAS, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.PATIENT_LOCAL_NAME as PATIENT_PATIENT_LOCAL_NAME, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.PATIENT_LOCATION as PATIENT_PATIENT_LOCATION, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.PATIENT_NAME as PATIENT_PATIENT_NAME, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.PATIENT_STATUS as PATIENT_PATIENT_STATUS, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.PATIENT_TYPE as PATIENT_PATIENT_TYPE, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.PATIENTID as PATIENT_PATIENTID, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.PHONENUMBER_BUSINESS as PATIENT_PHONENUMBER_BUSINESS, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.PHONENUMBER_HOME as PATIENT_PHONENUMBER_HOME, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.PRIMARY_LANGUAGE as PATIENT_PRIMARY_LANGUAGE, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.PRIOR_PATIENT_ID as PATIENT_PRIOR_PATIENT_ID, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.PRIOR_PATIENT_NAME as PATIENT_PRIOR_PATIENT_NAME, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.PRIOR_VISIT_NUMBER as PATIENT_PRIOR_VISIT_NUMBER, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.RACE as PATIENT_RACE, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.RELIGION as PATIENT_RELIGION, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.SEX as PATIENT_SEX, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.SSN_NUMBER as PATIENT_SSN_NUMBER, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.VETERANS_MIL_STATUS as PATIENT_VETERANS_MIL_STATUS, dbo.SQL_OUT_PATIENT.VISIT_NUMBER as PATIENT_VISIT_NUMBER,
dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.BODY_PART as ORDER_BODY_PART, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.CHARGE_AMOUNT as ORDER_CHARGE_AMOUNT, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.CHARGE_STATUS as ORDER_CHARGE_STATUS, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.CNT_AGENT as ORDER_CNT_AGENT, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.CUSTOMER_1 as ORDER_CUSTOMER_1, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.CUSTOMER_2 as ORDER_CUSTOMER_2, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.CUSTOMER_3 as ORDER_CUSTOMER_3, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.CUSTOMER_4 as ORDER_CUSTOMER_4, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.DATA_DT as ORDER_DATA_DT, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.DATA_ID as ORDER_DATA_ID, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.DURATION as ORDER_DURATION, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.EXAM_COMMENT as ORDER_EXAM_COMMENT, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.EXAM_DT as ORDER_EXAM_DT, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.EXAM_LOCATION as ORDER_EXAM_LOCATION, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.EXAM_REQUIREMENT as ORDER_EXAM_REQUIREMENT, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.EXAM_STATUS as ORDER_EXAM_STATUS, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.EXAM_VOLUME as ORDER_EXAM_VOLUME, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.FILLER as ORDER_FILLER, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.FILLER_CONTACT as ORDER_FILLER_CONTACT, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.FILLER_DEPARTMENT as ORDER_FILLER_DEPARTMENT, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.FILLER_NO as ORDER_FILLER_NO, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.MODALITY as ORDER_MODALITY, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.ORDER_NO as ORDER_ORDER_NO, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.PATIENT_ID as ORDER_PATIENT_ID, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.PLACER as ORDER_PLACER, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.PLACER_CONTACT as ORDER_PLACER_CONTACT, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.PLACER_DEPARTMENT as ORDER_PLACER_DEPARTMENT, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.PLACER_NO as ORDER_PLACER_NO, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.PROCEDURE_CODE as ORDER_PROCEDURE_CODE, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.PROCEDURE_DESC as ORDER_PROCEDURE_DESC, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.PROCEDURE_NAME as ORDER_PROCEDURE_NAME, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.REF_CLASS_UID as ORDER_REF_CLASS_UID, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.REF_CONTACT as ORDER_REF_CONTACT, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.REF_ORGANIZATION as ORDER_REF_ORGANIZATION, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.REF_PHYSICIAN as ORDER_REF_PHYSICIAN, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.REQUEST_REASON as ORDER_REQUEST_REASON, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.REUQEST_COMMENTS as ORDER_REUQEST_COMMENTS, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.SCHEDULED_DT as ORDER_SCHEDULED_DT, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.SERIES_NO as ORDER_SERIES_NO, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.STATION_AETITLE as ORDER_STATION_AETITLE, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.STATION_NAME as ORDER_STATION_NAME, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.STUDY_ID as ORDER_STUDY_ID, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.STUDY_INSTANCE_UID as ORDER_STUDY_INSTANCE_UID, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.TECHNICIAN as ORDER_TECHNICIAN, dbo.SQL_OUT_ORDER.TRANSPORT_ARRANGE as ORDER_TRANSPORT_ARRANGE,
dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.ACCESSION_NUMBER as REPORT_ACCESSION_NUMBER, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.COMMENTS as REPORT_COMMENTS, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.CUSTOMER_1 as REPORT_CUSTOMER_1, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.CUSTOMER_2 as REPORT_CUSTOMER_2, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.CUSTOMER_3 as REPORT_CUSTOMER_3, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.CUSTOMER_4 as REPORT_CUSTOMER_4, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.DATA_DT as REPORT_DATA_DT, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.DATA_ID as REPORT_DATA_ID, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.DIAGNOSE as REPORT_DIAGNOSE, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.MODALITY as REPORT_MODALITY, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.OBSERVATIONMETHOD as REPORT_OBSERVATIONMETHOD, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.PATIENT_ID as REPORT_PATIENT_ID, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.REPORT_APPROVER as REPORT_REPORT_APPROVER, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.REPORT_FILE as REPORT_REPORT_FILE, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.REPORT_INTEPRETER as REPORT_REPORT_INTEPRETER, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.REPORT_NO as REPORT_REPORT_NO, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.REPORT_STATUS as REPORT_REPORT_STATUS, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.REPORT_TYPE as REPORT_REPORT_TYPE, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.REPORT_WRITER as REPORT_REPORT_WRITER, dbo.SQL_OUT_REPORT.REPORTDT as REPORT_REPORTDT from SQL_OUT_DATAINDEX LEFT OUTER JOIN SQL_OUT_PATIENT ON SQL_OUT_DATAINDEX.DATA_ID = SQL_OUT_PATIENT.DATA_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SQL_OUT_ORDER ON SQL_OUT_DATAINDEX.DATA_ID = SQL_OUT_ORDER.DATA_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SQL_OUT_REPORT ON SQL_OUT_DATAINDEX.DATA_ID = SQL_OUT_REPORT.DATA_ID GO
OutboundConfig.UninstallTriggerScript:
-- =============================================
-- Author: HYS -- Create date: 2007-04-11 03:33:57 -- Description: Script used to drop outbound database objects, include -- View,procedure, trigger
-- ============================================= USE GWDataDB GO
OutboundConfig.UninstallConfigDBScript:
-- =============================================
-- Author: HYS -- Create date: 2007-04-11 03:33:57 -- Description: Script used to uninstall outbound adapter, -- delete special record in GWConfigDB
-- =============================================
Use [GWConfigDB] GO
